Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Duke's life prior to or as the outbreak began, except that he had at least one owner.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point after the outbreak, Duke and at least three other dogs became feral and began to travel and hunt together in a pack. Duke is one of the hunting dogs that emerge from the woods and take Rick 's group by surprise. He and the other dogs are promptly shot by a startled Sasha and cooked and eaten by the survivors shortly thereafter. Noah sees Duke's bloodied collar lying in the road and looks at it somewhat remorsefully.
Death[]: Killed By Sasha Williams After Duke appears from behind the trees with three other dogs aggressively, Sasha shoots Duke and the other dogs for food.
Trivia[]: Duke's name was confirmed on the Talking Dead segment for " Them ". Duke was a dog from the pound and so were the other dogs. Duke is the last named character to be directly killed Sasha Williams in the TV Series .
Name: Duke
